trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Corydon
There were no other sightings in Corydon on or around March 18th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsself and teen going west on county rd. in harrison co. saw 3 bright white ,round lights in a triangular shape up ahead.thought it to possibly be a plane flying low,however we were actually approaching it,as if it wasn't moving much or not at all.we came up on it on shiloh rd.,pulled over in a driveways edge to get better look.as we came to a stop it hovered,for approx. 5secs. longer than began slowly moving off to the north\west of us.it was only about 3-500' in the air ,was large the size of an airplane in length but much wider.it had 3 round large white lights on ,not strobing like others in past.it made a humming\swooshing sound,but nothing like an airplane or jet would make,it actually sounded closer to the sound of those 'quieter'helicopters.it did not disturb the car mechanics or us,we did not loose any time,just had a few moments of wonder before our eyes again.
Summary: Hovering next to road drove right under/past it!
